text.english: For more information regarding supplemental insurance options click the link below:

Participants who are traveling from outside Canada are encouraged to purchase Supplemental Insurace to cover any medical or travel issue during the OneWalk event. Supplemental Insurance is optional but if you choose not to purchase Supplemental Insurance we highly encourage you to check with your current Health Insurance provider to ensure you will be covered for any expenses while at the event. Only basic first aid will be provided by our on site medical staff.
